test_message: Present approval decision: dispute approved, full refund of $247.99, unauthorized transaction confirmed, credited within 3-5 business days

result.decision_summary: Your dispute has been approved, and you will receive a full refund of $247.99.
result.detailed_explanation: After carefully reviewing your case, we have confirmed that the transaction in question was unauthorized. For your protection, a full refund of $247.99 will be credited back to your original payment method. We understand situations like these can be stressful, and we appreciate your patience throughout this process.

policy_references.customer_friendly_explanation: Our policy ensures you are not responsible for charges you did not authorize. Once we verify a transaction is unauthorized, a full refund is granted.

next_steps.action: Monitor your payment account for the refund, which will appear as a credit of $247.99.
